findings.title: Nonfunctional _onlyWhiteListed Modifier in MasterRadpie
findings.description: The `_onlyWhiteListed` modifier in the `updatePoolsAlloc()` function of `MasterRadpie` contract does not work as expected, causing the function body to be skipped if the caller is authorized to update reward pool allocations.

findings.title: Possible Costly Share From Improper Liquidity Initialization
findings.description: The `RadiantStaking` contract may cause pool shares to become extremely expensive due to improper liquidity initialization, leading to hurdles or loss for later depositors.
